itunes:title: Episode 912 - Should We Fund the Iron Dome?
title: Episode 912 - Should We Fund the Iron Dome?
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Documentary filmmaker Ami Horowitz explains why he thinks The Squad (AOC, Ilhan Omar, et al.) are anti-semitic, why it's fine and good to criticize Israel but where the line between valid critiques and anti-semitism is drawn, and why the United States sh...
itunes:summary:
Documentary filmmaker Ami Horowitz explains why he thinks The Squad (AOC, Ilhan Omar, et al.) are anti-semitic, why it's fine and good to criticize Israel but where the line between valid critiques and anti-semitism is drawn, and why the United States should (or should not) fund Israel's famed Iron Dome.
